Title: Chapter 6
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Ned Martel, Crystal Liu (executive story editor), Todd Kubrak (story editor), Joshua Green (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Cuba Gooding Jr., Lily Rabe
Plot: After the wrap of the show My Roanoke Nightmare, the producer creates a follow up show called Return to Roanoke, bringing the actors of the previous show and the real Shelby, Matt, and Lee, back to the house.
